column2: Argentina emerged victorious in the World Cup final
column3: winning 4-2 in the penalty shootout. Messi and Di Maria scored the first-half goals for Argentina
column4: while Mbappe's late brace took the game into extra time. Messi thought he had won it for Argentina
column5: but Mbappe equalized from the spot to get his hat-trick. In the shootout
column6: Martinez made a crucial save before Tchouameni missed his attempt. Argentina converted all of their penalties
column7: with Montiel scoring the winning goal.
